Objects

PeopleAPI

Graph based API to get People or Employee information, including their relationships like line managers, reporting line and office location. You can use an Employee query if employee id is known or use a Search query to look up an Employee.

CodeSamples: [Code]

Field Type Description
employees [Employee] Navigate employee graph via this query, you will use this if you have access to Employee ID otherwise use search query. Returns multiple employee objects for the array of ids provided.
employee Employee Navigate employee graph via this query, you will use this if you have access to Employee ID otherwise use search query. Returns an Employee object.
search [Employee] DEPRECATED - Search has been deprecated, Use peopleSearch() instead, Lookup employee by name, title or any other information you know. Returns a list of employees Deprecated
peopleSearch Employees Lookup employee by name, title or any other information you know. Returns an object with list of employees and totalCount.
searchFilter Employees Lookup location by name, title or any other information you know. Returns the matching location objects as an array.
jobFunctions [JobFunction] Returns list of all distinct job functions
practiceAreas [PracticeArea] Returns list of all practice area objects
cohorts [String] Returns list of all distinct cohorts
preferences [OutputPreference] Returns list of preferences
team TeamOutput Return team for given team Id
teams [TeamOutput] Returns list of all the teams for an employee
allTeams [TeamOutput] Returns list of all the teams
entitlements [String] Returns list of all groups of an employee
topicCategories [Topic] List of all topic role categories
topicGroups [RoleGroup] List all topic role groups
PeopleAPIProfileQuery_Realtimecustomreport [String] <iframe src="https://www.site24x7.eu/public/dashboard/FBlvh5-GIjZQ09kmJ05p1Fwf7Ra0mG2BSCYyMVfmq2alBW5Tkx55s7bPHfqIzxvLEOtJnC8lr8dQtZG5e-rGOAuhQYjGHWTH4izoFkhk3JTrq3xlVKIiynzbPbiIhati" scrolling="yes" align="center" height="200" width="800" border="0" frameborder="0"></iframe>
PeopleAPIResponseTime_Oneweektimelinedata [String] <iframe src="https://app.datadoghq.com/graph/embed?token=604d6baee98a8207f465840f9eeef3847bf06fa983bf64be7f6489793fbb61c5&height=200&width=400&legend=true" width="400" height="200" frameborder="0"></iframe>

Employee

Employee Type - the main data structure used by the People API graph. In a logical People graph, each node is an instance of this type.

Field Type Description
id String Employee’s unique Id.
name String Full name of the Employee with ‘Surname, Firstname’ format.
displayName String Display name of the Employee with ‘Surname Firstname’ format.
firstName String Employee’s first name.
lastName String Employee’s last name.
slackId String Employee’s Slack alias
title String Employee’s Business title.
cohort String Employee’s cohort
status String Employee’s status Active/Inactive/LOA
jobFunction String Employee’s job function
globalTitle String Employee’s global title
email String Employee’s official email.
phone String Employee’s official phone.
mobile String Employee’s official mobile phone.
nationality String Employee’s nationality
hireDate String Employee’s hiring date (timestamp)
hostOfficeId String Employee’s host office code, where the employee is currently based
hostOfficeRegion String Host office region
homeOfficeId String Employee’s home office code
homeOfficeRegion String Employee’s home office region
location String DEPRECATED - location has been deprecated. Use hostLocation { officeCode } or hostOfficeCode instead , Employee’s host office location code, where the employee is currently based
hostOfficeLocation Location Employee’s host office location object, where the employee is currently based.
homeOfficeLocation Location Employee’s home office location object, where the employee is from.
picture String Employee’s profile pic in jpeg format.
profilePicture String Employee’s profile pic in jpeg format.
lineManagerId String Line Manager’s Id.
lineManager Employee Line Manager, returned as an Employee object.
reportingLine [Employee] Reporting line of the employee. Returned as an array of Employee objects.
lastUpdated String Timestamp when people api updated itself with the snowflake
preferences [OutputPreference] Preferences of employee
practiceArea String Practice area the employee belongs to
practiceAreas [PracticeAreaInfo] Practice areas details of an employee
responsibilityCenterId String Employee’s responsibility center Id
responsibilityCenterName String Employee’s responsibility center name
responsibilityPercentage String Employee’s responsibility percentage
responsibilityGroupName String Employee’s responsibility group name

Location

Location Type - object for the office location

Field Type Description
id String Unique office code
name String Office name
regionId String Unique region id of the office
street String Street where office is located
street2 String Street where office is located
street3 String Street where office is located
city String City of office
state String State of Office
zipCode String Zip-code of office
country String Country of office
countryCode String Country code of office
geoLocation GeoLocation Geolocation has latitude and longitude
phone String Phone number of office
imageUrl String Link to an office image
contentLinks [ContentType] Contents inside the office location
timezone String Time zone of the location
weather Weather current weather for the location

GeoLocation

GeoLocation Type - object for latitude and longitude

Field Type Description
lat String Latitude of a geo location
lon String Longitude of a geo location

ContentType

Object representation for the ContentLink

Field Type Description
name String Name of the content
link String Link to the content
image String Icon name for the content

Weather

Weather Model

Field Type Description
icon String Weather icon to be used
description String Weather description of the description
temperature [WeatherUnit] Temperature in both celcius and farenheit

WeatherUnit

Weather Unit Model

Field Type Description
type String Unit Type- Celcius or Farenheit
value Float Current temperature

OutputPreference

Output preference object

Field Type Description
employeeId String Employee Id
key String Preferences name
values [ValueType] Preferences values

ValueType

Preference representation

Field Type Description
id String Preferred employee id
type String Preference type. Default is string
timestamp String Epoch Timestamp number

PracticeAreaInfo

Practice Area Details

Field Type Description
Level String Level of expertise
Topic String Topic of the practice area
Type String Practice area type

Employees

List of employees for search result with total number of employees actually exists for seach query provided

Field Type Description
employees [Employee] List of employee objects
totalCount Int The total number of matching employees for the search query exists in data base, regardless of limit provided
searchFilters [SearchResultFilterType]  

SearchResultFilterType

SearchResultFilter

Field Type Description
field String FIlter Field Value
filters [ResultFilterType]  

ResultFilterType

ResultFilterType

Field Type Description
key String FIlter Field Value
count String Longitude of a geo location

JobFunction

Object representation for a Job Function

Field Type Description
name String Name of the Job Function

PracticeArea

Object representation for the Practice Area

Field Type Description
name String Name of the practice area
category String Category of pracitce area
topics [PracticeAreaTopic] Topics inside practice area
imageUrl String URL of the practice area image
homeUrl String Home Url in practice are
contentLinks [ContentType] Contents inside the practice area

PracticeAreaTopic

Object representation for the Practice Area Topic

Field Type Description
name String Name of the topic

TeamOutput

Team data

Field Type Description
_id String Team Id
name String Team name
summary String Team information summary
slackURL String Team slack URL
egnyteURL String Team egnyte URL
image String Image for the team
imageName String Image for the team
employeeIds [String] Employee Ids of team members
contentLinks [ContentType] Contents links for team

Topic

Field Type Description
id ID topic id
name String name of topic
sortOrder String sorting preference for UI
roleCategories [RoleCategory] categories of role

RoleCategory

Field Type Description
id ID Role category id
name String Name of Role category
groups [RoleGroup] Goups of Role
sortOrder Int sorting preference for UI

RoleGroup

Field Type Description
id ID Role group id
name String Name of role group
sortOrder Int sorting preference for UI
roles [TopicRole] List of roles in current group

TopicRole

Field Type Description
id ID Role id
name String Name of role
description String Description of the role
displayText String Display text for the role
detailDisplayText String Detailed description of role
contact Employee Employee details
sortOrder Int sorting preference for UI

PreferncesAPIMutation

Graph based mutation to store an employee’s preferences and create teams

Field Type Description
preference OutputPreference Add user preferences
team TeamOutput Create Team
deleteTeam TeamOutput Delete Team
updateTeam TeamOutput Update Team
